channel.title: Language Learning on
channel.description: Recent content in Language Learning on

item.title: Where should you start your Arabic language learning?
item.description: Arabic is widely taught in schools and universities and is used to varying degrees in workplaces, government and the media. Arabic, in its standard form, is the official language of 26 states, as well as the liturgical language of the religion of Islam, since the Quran and Hadith were written in Arabic. In this course, you will learn how to read Arabic. by taking lessons gradually and easily, after finishing this course you will start practice reading by yourself.

item.title: Complete Georgian Course: Learn Georgian for Beginners
item.description: Welcome to our ultimate ultimate Georgian beginner course that will teach you Georgian faster than you thought possible! If you’ve ever dreamed of travelling to Georgia and holding your own in real-life situations, being independent and able to communicate with the locals, this is the course for you! During our course you will learn: Lots and lots of vocabulary How to read and write in Georgian Useful everyday phrases Basic sentence structures

item.title: speak arbic like natives
item.description: Arabic is an old language . It is believed to have originated in the Arabian Peninsula. rabic, which first emerged in the northwest of the Arabian Peninsula, is a member of the Semitic family of languages which also includes Hebrew and Aramaic. Whilst very early manifestations of Arabic date back as far as the 8th century BCE, the language has been defined and refined over a considerable period of time.Arabic is at least 1,500 years old.

item.title: English grammar tenses made easy
item.description: This course will indeed be beneficial for those students who want to learn the simple, continuous and perfect forms of present, past and future tenses. The course will cover a plethora of examples in order to demonstrate the structure of the different tenses in English grammar. This course will be especially useful for students who are new to English language and are passionate about learning grammatical rules insofar as tenses are concerned.

item.title: Learn Chinese, Basic Mandarin Chinese, HSK 1 Preparation
item.description: This HSK course is designed according to HSK standard course book with detailed explanation and assignments for Chinese beginners. This course will help you learn Chinese like kids, learn Chinese words stroke by stroke. We divided each unit to several lessons, each HSK lesson is less than 8 mins, which will help you learn Chinese in a less pressure way. You will be able to learn Chinese easily and pass the HSK1 exam without any difficulties.

item.title: The Easy Way to Speak English For Beginners
item.description: Learn how to speak English more clearly and more confidently with this amazing English course. This course is for beginners who want to speak English or anyone who suffers a lot when speaking English and want to find an easy way to speak English with confidence, You will improve your speaking skills, listening skills and pronunciation in English. Includes videos, Pdf files and free resources to online speaking and pronunciation activities.

item.title: Complete Italian for Beginners: Speak Italian like a Pro
item.description: **The ultimate Italian beginner course that will teach you Italian faster than you thought possible** Suppose you've ever wanted to travel to Italy and be able to hold your own in real-life circumstances, be independent, and converse with the people. In that case, our complete Italian beginners' course is the right place to start! This comprehensive Italian course will teach you all you need to know to become a natural Italian speaker.

item.title: English placement test - Unofficial
item.description: Who wants to know his / her level... you have to answer these tests and be okay with them. You have to revise your language before tests. these tests only to know your level. test your English with your own... practice test, just to know your level to improve it. focus on your language and your grammer... it's at all your English placement test... You can also share the test results with us and get advice.

item.title: Improve English by Listening Movies – 1b
item.description: Are you feeling so much difficulty to understand people in real life? Can’t understand exactly what that guy is telling you on the phone? Not able to understand the speech when you are watching the video on the web? You can easily understand a piece of text by reading, but you are not able to understand people by listening, have you been suffering from this problem since you started to learn English?

item.title: Improve English by Movies
item.description: Let’s go back to our childhood and think about primary school for a moment. I am talking about the time when we were six or seven years old. The question here is, What was the first thing they taught us at primary school? First thing they taught us was Writing and Reading, right? Why it wasn’t Listening and Speaking? Of course, listening and speaking were the core abilities that we were accepted to a primary school.

item.title: Use Would in English
item.description: One of the difficulties of English learners is to understand 'would' clearly. Understanding 'would' is a challenge and be able to use it in a sentence is another challenge, isn’t it? No matter how many times I attempted to understand 'would' either by looking up the dictionaries or the grammar books, none of them made any difference and I ended up not to understand it. Curious thing is that I came across would quite often and it was literally driving me crazy because I was not able to discover the hidden secret behind it.

item.title: Improve English by Listening Movies – 1c
item.description: Are you feeling so much difficulty to understand people in real life? Can’t understand exactly what that guy is telling you on the phone? Not able to understand the speech when you are watching the video on the web? You can easily understand a piece of text by reading, but you are not able to understand people by listening, have you been suffering from this problem since you started to learn English?

item.title: Kids English Vocabulary Set One - Nouns
item.description: What will children learn? Kids will learn new words in English language from different parts of speech that they can use later in their speaking Are there any course requirement? There are absolutely no requirements of the course except your device to enjoy watching our videos. Who are the targeted audience? The targeted audience are children aged 4-12 (with the permisson and supervision of their parents; please read the crucial note)

item.title: The 150 Most Important Irregular Verbs in English. Volume 1
item.description: Support available in: English Spanish French I can't wait to share with you this exciting English course based on Irregular Verbs. Do you feel unsure about the right conjugation when you try use irregular verbs in every day conversation? Are you frustrated of having to memorize unending word lists? Then this course is for you. It is not a secret that Irregular Verbs are hard to learn. So when Enlglish learners try to use the verbs in a professional situation it is very embarrassing not to use the right conjugation, and your chances to give a good impression to your potential employer are gone.

item.title: American English Pronunciation for Beginners
item.description: Are you struggling with your English pronunciation? Do you have a strong accent when speaking English? Do native speakers always ask you to repeat yourself? Do you want to begin speaking with an American accent confidently? Do you what tips and help with speaking with an American accent? I welcome you to this - “American English Pronunciation Training - course where I will patiently guide you through the basic techniques you need to pronounce English sounds correctly.

item.title: Learn Egyptian Arabic through Cartoons
item.description: This is actually a new idea in teaching a foreign language , Hello everyone. I'm Mr,Bakoor. I have been teaching Arabic for several years. so I have enough experience in teaching Arabic, in this course I come up with a new idea a new strategy to Egyptian Arabic this idea is you will get fun while learning Egyptian dialect. this idea will make memorization easier to, you will find it enjoyable and easy to learn.

item.title: English Grammar Practice Tests Level B1 2021
item.description: The course contains six practice tests. A practice test contains 25 questions. Target audience are students before an English Level B1 exam; alternatively, English language learning students who want to test English Level B1 knowledge. The purpose of the practice test is to support students before an English Level B1 exam. #englishgrammar #englishb1 #englishexam #englishlevelb1 What is the B1 English level Test? CEFR or CEFRL (Common European Framework of Reference) is an international language ability standard by the Council of Europe.

item.title: English vocabulary: Learn more than 200 words for beginners
item.description: The course discusses the most important vocabulary used in the English language and not vocabulary only but uses this vocabulary in a situational sentence. English vocabulary is the basis of sentence structure if you get more words, you can express yourself much better. Vocabulary is n't mere words, it is the expressions of your feelings and communicates with others around you. Ratings: 3.18/5 Enrollments: 55553 Coupon Code: C4EEB045E9D888B621B0 Current Price: FREE

item.title: English Tenses Structures : Upgrade your Understanding
item.description: In this course, I will explain in detail all the English tenses that cause problems for the English learners. Present, past, and future tenses will be discussed also passive structures for every tense. What makes this course different? I will explain the course in both languages English and Arabic. That's because I found many students asked me to explain in Arabic. So I will give more explanations in both languages for more benefit for students.

item.title: Complete Polish Course: Learn Polish for Beginners
item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn Polish? As the second most-spoken Slavic language with over 55 million native speakers, there are many benefits to learning this familiar, yet exotic language. In this course, we’re going to take you through the first steps of your Polish journey, from absolute beginner to an intermediate level. Our lessons will cover everything, from teaching you how to read and write the Polish alphabet, to conjugating verbs and declining nouns, to forming sentences and describing yourself, the world around you and actions that take place within it.

item.title: The English Conversation Course | Master the key expressions
item.description: Welcome to our English Conversation Course! By taking this course, you will develop the most important English skill - the ability to converse in English. In this course, you will learn how to converse in English in topics that are relevant for for beginner learners, so we deal with the most common topics, such as talking about names and age, and the language structure is appropriate for beginner learners. The main aim of this course is to develop your speaking skill, so in every video lesson, there are various speaking practices meaning that you will need to speak out loud and participate in every lesson.

item.title: Learn basic Italian in 2 hours
item.description: Have you ever found yourself wanting to learn Italian, but never actually doing so? Start now! It is easy and fast! You’ve heard it’s a difficult language? Don’t believe everything that they tell you. Italian is an easy and funny language. What about learning basic Italian in only two hours?This is a practical, fast and easy course. With it, you will immediately be able to have a basic conversation in the Italian language.

item.title: Aprenda rapidamente o Inglês Britânico e divirta-se. Curso#6
item.description: Please be aware. This course is for "COMPLETE" beginners British English lessons easy to understand and follow. Course 1 of 50 This is the course you are looking for. A completely new approach to learning English. This is a basic English course lasting 30 to 40 minutes in each class, easy to follow and understand. We use real examples in short films in a clear conversational methodology. Prof. Steve Bradeley is British and has 30 years of teaching experience.

item.title: English Grammar tenses & structures
item.description: It is a well-crafted course. It teaches you how to build English grammar sentences which are perfect in both structures and tenses. It takes you to step by step to be able to differentiate among subject, verb, and object. It enables you to transform any English sentence from active to passive and vice versa. We provide you with daily quizzes that come with model answers. Ratings: 4.41/5 Enrollments: 198164 Coupon Code: APRIL2

item.title: 2022 Miller Analogies Test (MAT) TOP Practical Questions
item.description: Hello ! Most Common Miller Analogies Test (MAT) professional Questions with your hand 97% Pass in First Attempt Easily The Miller Analogies Test (MAT) is a standardized test used both for graduate school admissions in the United States and entrance to high I.Q. societies. Created and still published by Harcourt Assessment (now a division of Pearson Education), the MAT consists of 120 questions in 60 minutes (formerly 100 questions in 50 minutes).

item.title: Aprenda rapidamente o Inglês Britânico e divirta-se. Curso#2
item.description: Suas primeiras aulas de Inglês Britânico fáceis de entender e seguir. Curso 1 de 50 Este é o curso que você procura. Uma abordagem completamente nova para aprender Inglês. Este é um curso básico de Inglês com duração de 30 à 40 minutos em cada aula, fáceis de seguir e entender. Usamos exemplos reais em curtas-metragens em uma metodologia de conversação clara. O Prof. Steve Bradeley é Britânico e tem mais de 30 anos de experiência docente.

item.title: Aprenda rapidamente o Inglês Britânico e divirta-se. Curso#4
item.description: COURSE DESCRIPTION Suas primeiras aulas de inglês britânico fáceis de entender e seguir. Este é o curso que você procura. Uma abordagem completamente nova para aprender inglês. Este é um curso básico dos primeiros 30 a 40 minutos de aulas de inglês fáceis de entender. Usamos exemplos reais em curtas-metragens e uma metodologia de conversação clara. O professor é britânico e tem 30 anos de experiência docente. Ele é assistido pela mais moderna tecnologia.

item.title: Arabic Language Course For Beginners
item.description: New Updates We added new Lessons to " Arabic Language Course For Beginners " Here is what we added: Greetings Subject Pronouns How to make a Sentence in Arabic Arabic Numbers Week Days The Universe Family Members Body Parts Introduce Yourself At the Airport -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- السلام عليكم In this Course, we will learn Arabic Alphabet from Alef to Yaa Firstly, we will take general view for all letters, then, we will learn each letter in details :

item.title: The Melody of English
item.description: Intonation signals to your audience that you are connecting thought units or ending them. Sometimes we end them with finality, uncertainty, questions, or excitement, for example. Intonation helps listeners follow you with ease. Intonation also gives language a melody and keeps it from sounding boring. This course will teach you proper breathing that works in sync with your intonation. You will also learn how to divide vowels so that the vowels can carry the intonation.

item.title: Learn Spanish Now: All-in-One Knowledge Course
item.description: Learn Spanish Now: All-in-One Knowledge Course is a condensed Latin American Spanish (small difference from Spain Spanish) course built to teach students of all levels (from beginners to experienced) in a self-paced and approachable manner that avoids the awkwardness or time constraints of a classroom. This course delves deeper than just teaching you how to say a simple greeting or basic nouns, it actually aims to get you engaged and involved in speaking and writing in the language as soon as your first day through interactive video lessons and lectures, and resources only available to students in this course.

item.title: Arabic Language Course: Learn to Read Arabic, Write & Listen
item.description: New Update: We added Arabic Audiobook + MP3 Files + Translation in English. New Update: We added new Section to Learn Writing in Arabic. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- السلام عليكم In this Course, you will learn to Read, Write & Listen to Arabic through Short Stories & Audiobooks. This Course is divided into 9 Sections: In the First Section: you will learn How to Write & Pronounce Arabic Alphabet, and we will take some words for each letter.

item.title: Aprenda os Tempos Verbais do Inglês A GRAMÁTICA CORRETA
item.description: Este curso rápido de 90 minutos com 14 vídeos, é projetado para você que quer tornar-se um falante fluente de Inglês em níveis Iniciante, Intermediário e Avançado e se concentrará na introdução ou aprimoramento da Gramática Inglesa. O conteúdo foi preparado e é apresentado pelo Prof. Steve W. Bradeley. Nascido no Reino Unido, é experiente no ensino de Inglês por mais de 30 anos e que além de lecionar em escolas em Londres, possui publicações voltadas no ramo.

item.title: Leer Nederlands in het Nederlands 2: voor beginners (NT2-A1)
item.description: Klaar om online Nederlands te leren? Hou je van Nederlands? Ken je al ongeveer 100-150 woorden? Hou je van een uitdaging? Leer je liever online talen? Goed zo! Je gaat met mij de Nederlandse taal leren... 100% in het Nederlands! Een cursus voor beginners, maar niet voor absolute beginners De cursus start niet vanaf 0, kijk naar mijn eerste cursus 'Nederlands in het Nederlands 1' op Udemy. Je moet ongeveer 100-150 woorden begrijpen, maar veel woorden gaan we herhalen.

item.title: Complete Filipino Course: Learn Filipino for Beginners
item.description: The ultimate Filipino beginner course that will teach you Filipino faster than you thought possible! Perhaps you’ve dreamed of travelling to the Philippines and holding your own in real-life situations, being independent and able to communicate with the locals. Perhaps you want to experience the rich culture and sample the delicious local cuisine or do business with local companies. Whatever your reason, this Filipino course for beginners is right for you!

item.title: Arabic language conversational beginner course | byna yadek
item.description: Hello, I'm Mr.Bakoor. I have been teaching Arabic language for a while. I got students form All over the world. My respect for all of them. My students liked the way I teach because It's easy, it goes step by step, they easily understand and also show improvement, I feel so happy when I my student telling me that they are really improving in Arabic langauge, I hope to make Arabic teaching easier for everyone who think Learning Arabic is hard.

item.title: Test Chinese Vocabulary According HSK By Flash Card V2021
item.description: Our "Test Your HSK Chinese Level in 10 Minutes" is very useful for school teacher and students. New video will be added every month till December. Our "Test Your Vocabulary Level in 10 Minutes" is very useful for school teacher and students. New video will be added every month till December. We create a set of teaching contents to Assess Your Progress According HSK 1-6 Vocabulary List and CEFRL A1-C2: 1.

item.title: Vowels for Advanced Chinese learners of American English
item.description: Meaning can be altered when listeners don't understand your vowels. Changing one vowel slightly can completely change the meaning of a word. Not spending enough time on one vowel can also change the meaning! Learn how to correct the American English vowel pronunciation errors that native Chinese speakers frequently make. The instructor uses a vowel chart to demonstrate the similarities and differences between all the vowels. Then she describes and shows exactly how to produce each vowel and puts the vowels in example sentences that use advanced vocabulary from professional settings, such as high tech and business.

item.title: American English Vowels for Indian IT Professionals
item.description: In this American English pronunciation course, specifically designed to meet the needs of speakers from India, learn to accurately produce the American vowels which Indian speakers of English often confuse. These tricky vowels include learning to distinguish between "peek" and "pick" and between "look" and "Luke." Also learn to distinguish between "bone and "born" and many other troublesome pairs. Computer professionals can learn to reduce or minimize their accents in an IT vocabulary context.

item.title: Impara una nuova lingua: Tutti i segreti dei poliglotti
item.description: In questo corso voglio racchiudere tutte le cose che ho imparato in oltre 10 anni di studio delle lingue straniere, sia all'università che da autodidatta, applicando gli insegnamenti di chi ne sapeva più di me, non solo grandi professori ed accademici, anche e soprattutto i più famosi poliglotti, grazie a questi insegnamenti ho imparato o migliorato 5 lingue straniere (spagnolo, inglese, tedesco, cinese mandarino e portoghese) e ne sto imparando di altre.

item.title: Kapsamlı İngilizce Kursu
item.description: Bilindiği üzere, İngilizce başta olmak üzere yabancı dil öğrenme ile ilgili her geçen gün birçok teknik ve çalışma geliştirilmektedir. İngilizce, dünyanın dili olarak, iş ve eğitim konusunda bilinmesi elzem bir dildir. Bu kurs, yabancı dil öğrenme tekniklerinin birçok araştırma neticesinde elde edilen verilerine dayanılarak oluşturulmuş ve çalışmalar, derslere, anlayabileceğiniz bir sıra ile dizayn edilmiştir. Bu kurs, size İngilizceyi artık mevcut olan tüm tekniklerden farklı bir şekilde öğretecek. Bu kursta alacağınız bilgileri aslında tam da ihtiyacınız olan ve anlayabileceğiniz bir sırada öğreneceksiniz.

item.title: Basics of the Arabic Language
item.description: Update | Date: November 20th, 2021. If you have any questions/comments please, do not hesitate to contact me. Good Luck! ______________________________________________________________ The Arabic language is not easy to learn but, it depends on the way of learning. In this course, you will learn a lot through a nice way of teaching and nice lecture slides design to help you start speaking Arabic with more confidence. This course includes: Background: Culture and History

item.title: Arabic Writing Course For Beginners
item.description: السلام عليكم In this course, we will learn Writing in Arabic. This course is divided into 3 stages: In the first stage, We will learn how to write each letter at any position of any word. Then, We will learn how to write a sentence with Diacritics. And Finally, We will learn how to write a paragraph with Diacritics. By finishing this course, you will be able to write anything in Arabic.

item.title: Beginner English: Practical Foundational English Training
item.description: This course is a beginner level English course (A1-A2). The student understands basic phrases and instructions. He/she can interact in a very simple way and uses incomplete sentences, without real grammatical content. He/she may be able to participate in a dialogue giving personal information but in a limited way using minimal vocabulary. This course is designed to improve your English at its foundation. You will have a basic understanding of English and be able to speak it immediately.

item.title: Sıfırdan Konuşturan İngilizce Kursu (20+ Saat)
item.description: • Bir dil en iyi doğal haliyle öğrenilir, yani çocukların öğrendiği gibi, kelimeleri sık sık duyarak. • Hem Türkçe hem Kürtçe konuşan arkadaşınızın neden İngilizce öğrenemediğini hiç düşündünüz mü? • İngilizce zor diye mi? • En zor dil hangisi? • Size göre Çince mi? • Peki 2 milyar insan Çinceyi nasıl konuşuyor? • Peki okuma yazma bilmeyen anne babanın bile çocuğuna konuşma dilini öğretirken, üniversitede öğretmenlik okumuş birinin neden dil öğretemediğini?

item.title: English Word Placement and Grammar Test - Quiz Bank A051
item.description: This test bank is prepared in five different categories. It has been prepared in such a way that everyone from all walks of life can benefit and test their knowledge, not just for English Language sentences' structure knowledge interests or students. With this test, you will have the opportunity to improve yourself. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to get to know yourself and your environment better by going deeper into English Language These tests have a unique content and you can use what you do not know as a criterion to improve yourself at the end of the test.

item.title: Yds-Yökdil ve Ydt için Gramer Öğren
item.description: Bu kurs, katılımcıları ülkemizde yapılan lisans üstü eğitimler için gerekli YDS, YÖKDİL sınavlarına hazırlanan ara sınıf ve üniversite mezunu öğrencileri ile 12. sınıftan mezun liselerin dil bölümü öğrencilerinin katıldığı YDT (YKS-DİL) sınavlarında başarılı olmalarını sağlamak amacıyla hazırlanmış pratik gramer bilgisi konularını içermektedir. Günlük hayatta da bu sınavlara öğrenciler hazırlayan ve onlara danışmanlık eden İngilizce Öğretmeni Serkan Coşkun tarafından özenle hazırlanan eğitimlerde temel amaç öğrencilerimize İngilizce'yi sevdirmek ve onların kafasını karıştırmadan dil bilgisi konularını açık-seçik kavratmaktır.

item.title: Tenses Wizard | Learn Tenses in an easy and unique way
item.description: TENSES WIZARD is a Unique concept which aims at helping learners understanding the MOST IMPERATIVE GRAMMATICAL CONCEPT- The Tenses. The course is designed and organized in beautiful format of One pagers which are extremely Result oriented and helps a learner understand each and every Tense properly along with the videos which explained in details . Not only this much, learner will also get hands on 50+ practice worksheets along with the example sentences which comes as a part of Tenses Wizard.

item.title: English Speaking in Hindi- English Communication skills 2021
item.description: Interactive learning English speaking course on Udemy is the package of - English Speaking + Communication Skills + Storytelling. It is Masterclass for Beginners to Advanced level, Learn English Grammar, Vocabulary & Storytelling & Interview preparation & presentation Skills in one course. This course is in the Hindi language. (यह कोर्स हिंदी भाषा में है | ) A comprehensive course that focused on English speaking skills. It is specifically designed to help you build all the necessary skills for real-life day-to-day English conversations.

item.title: Basic Arabic Reading
item.description: Learning Arabic is challenging in many ways. This course focuses on building the skill to read any Arabic word, by both learning the alphabet, including learning the name, sound, and shapes of each letter. In addition, the diacritics that guide the pronunciation of words are also explained. Finally, major prefixes and suffixes are also introduced. After you complete this course, you will be able to recognize the letters of any word and sound it out, which is the first step to read Arabic script.

item.title: Arabic language through Drama | learn and entertain
item.description: In this course you will learn Arabic by Fun, watching Arabic series. The method will I apply in my videos are new and creative. So I have made new methods to teach you Arabic, hopefully this method will help a lot students to learn Arabic easily. And at the end if you got any questions, don't hesitate ask me directly. I will be happy to answer all of your questions.

item.title: Complete Portuguese Course: Portuguese for Beginners
item.description: Welcome to our ultimate Portuguese beginner course that will teach you Portuguese faster than you thought possible! If you’ve ever dreamed of travelling to Portugal and holding your own in real-life situations, being independent and able to communicate with the locals, our beginner series is the perfect place for you to continue your Portuguese journey! There’s always more to learn, and we’ve prepared yet another course to enrich your vocabulary, advance your grammar and help you express more and more complex thoughts, all in Portuguese!

item.title: Master the English Irregular Verbs Once and For All
item.description: Hi! I'm Carlos. I'm a Trilingual Udemy Instructor, and I can't wait to help you improve your fluency, and other skills in speaking English. I have created this shorter version for you to get a taste of another of my courses. This will help you see the quality of the course and our teaching style. Expect more information in the near future. When I designed this course, I put myself where you are now.

item.title: How to read Arabic for beginners | Basics & principles
item.description: Arabic is widely taught in schools and universities and is used to varying degrees in workplaces, government and the media. Arabic, in its standard form, is the official language of 26 states, as well as the liturgical language of the religion of Islam, since the Quran and Hadith were written in Arabic. In this course, you will learn how to read Arabic. by taking lessons gradually and easily, after finishing this course you will start practice reading by yourself.

item.title: English grammar tenses & structures, the ultimate course
item.description: The course provides you with a variety of grammar rules that enable you to read, write and form perfect English sentences. The course forms a great combination of grammar rules with examples. It takes you step by step from understanding the rule into applying examples that enhance your English language skills. We add weekly quizzes with model answers. Ratings: 4.39/5 Enrollments: 174726 Coupon Code: SEPTEMBER26 Current Price: FREE Enroll Now: Click Here

item.title: TOEFL reading practice tests Questions and Answers
item.description: TOEFL reading practice tests Questions and Answers 2022 reading tests for TOEFL Test of English as a Foreign Language Test of English as a Foreign Language TOEFL is a standardized test to measure the English language ability of non-native speakers wishing to enroll in English-speaking universities. The test is accepted by more than 11,000 universities and other institutions in over 150 countries. TOEFL is one of the two major English-language tests in the world, the other being the IELTS.

item.title: Deutsch - Klare Kommunikation A2-C1
item.description: Wie kann ich klar kommunizieren, das was mir wichtig ist? Wie können Konflikte so angesprochen werden, dass mein Gegenüber bereit ist zu kooperieren? Lernen Sie zu formulieren was Sie möchten, anstatt nur zu sagen was sie stört. Kann ich mich so ausdrücken, dass das was ich bin, unzweideutig mitgeteilt wird? Neben dem Erwerb von psychosozialen Kompetenzen für den Beruf und Alltag werden im Kurshilfreiche Kommunikationsstrukturen, sowie ein differenziertes psychologisches Vokabular erlernt.

item.title: English Language Practice Test
item.description: Preparing for Competitive Exams like IELTS or TOEFL and looking for more practice questions on English Grammar? You have come to the right practice assessment course! Test your knowledge with this practice test created by experts who have years of experience in the field. Suitable for beginners who want to improve their understanding of written English or to improve their knowledge with explanations and timed tests. Most questions and multiple choice and fill in the blank type.

item.title: Be an expert in English Grammar
item.description: The course has 14 sections. They display the different grammar rules in a funny way that depends on the animated cartoons. These 14 sections have 96 lectures. These 96 lectures have 2 hours of video content. This course takes you from level 1 to be a professional in the English grammar. Ratings: 4.30/5 Enrollments: 72280 Coupon Code: SEPTEMBER16 Current Price: FREE Enroll Now: Click Here

item.title: English Pronunciation Masterclass
item.description: Hi! My name is Professor G and I'm an English teacher with more than 10 years of teaching experience. I previously studied French and Spanish at university, and I've taught English in a number of countries around the world, including Brazil (Campinas), France (Paris) and Spain (Malaga). I understand the problems that language learners experience, especially when it comes to speaking the language. When I first moved to France, I had studied French for 5 years, but had very little speaking practice.

item.title: English language basics for beginners
item.description: We make it easy for you to learn how to speak and write English fluently as a beginner learner. These English lessons will show you how to say and use almost anything in daily English conversation. Get started now with our speaking, vocabulary and grammar exercises that come with model answers. In this course, you will learn important topics and lessons in English, such as, Alphabet, numbers, saying hello, signs and symbols, telling the time, asking and answering questions about name, age, weather, classroom things, classroom instructions, days of the week, months of the year, seasons of the year, basic colors, simple shapes and much more.

item.title: Arabic: Learn Arabic Language| Online Arabic Language Course
item.description: Marhaba (Hello and welcome)! My name is Nezha, and welcome to Arabic 4 U! ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ After taking this online Arabic language course, you will start to: Speak Arabic with Arabic speakers from around the world Understand Formal Arabic called Modern Standard Arabic MSA or Fusha Arabic speakers learn Modern Standard Arabic in school. It is used in Arabic books, Arabic news, Arabic documentaries, Arabic road signs, and Arabic formal speeches.

item.title: Complete French Course: Learn French for Beginners
item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn French? Dubbed the “language of love”, French is used by over 235 million speakers daily in over 54 countries. But why should you pick French out of all the languages you could be learning? To start, France isn’t just one of the most beautiful countries in central Europe, but a global powerhouse with significant presence in the automobile, aircraft and chemical manufacturing, the electronic, machinery, metallurgy industries, as well as tourism.

item.title: Complete Tamil Course: Learn Tamil for Beginners
item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn Tamil? As one of the oldest classical languages in the world, Tamil is spoken by over 70 million people. But why should you pick Tamil out of all the languages you could be learning? To start, Tamil is the official language of Tamil Nadu, India’s fourth largest state, which has seen significant economic growth and foreign investment over the last decade. The state is a leading figure in several industries, such as automobile and auto-components, engineering, pharmaceuticals and others.

item.title: Japanese for French speakers : katakana
item.description: C'est un cours complet pour apprendre tous les katakana, l'alphabet de base japonais qui est utilisé pour écrire certaines catégories de mots tels que les mots étrangers ou les onomatopées. Grâce à des photos, des illustrations animées, une bande-son et des sous-titres en français, vous apprendrez facilement à lire le tableau entier des 46 katakana, à les prononcer parfaitement et à les écrire dans le bon ordre. Vous ne serez pas ennuyés, car à la fin de chaque section vous pourrez vérifier vos progrès avec des quiz amusants.
